website_summaries.verdict: A great reflective rain jacket with a feminine cut and details meant for everyday use.
pros: Not fitted but still has a pretty feminine silhouette
Large, zippered pockets keep essentials close at hand
cons: Even with the hood cinched, you're likely to get rain in your face

customer_reviews.title: True RAIN jacket
customer_reviews.text: If you want a true rain jacket this is it, but bear in mind, this is actually more of a "slicker". The outer layer is a very lightweight, almost rubbery material, but is very flexible, very light. I should've realized this may be the case when the description states it's waterPROOF. It looks nice, fits nice, but I'll be returning it because it's not a jacket I would wear unless I was intending to be out in the rain or possibly in some boating instances. I'm looking for a light-weight jacket I can wear at anytime, and if it happens to start raining I have some protection.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I did not keep this jacket but I wanted to review it because it is a good product. The color was perfect, and the size was too big, which means I could have gone smaller, which is a nice change for me. The only reason I did not keep it was it was not light weight enough for me. I would recommend it to anyone who may be traveling to a cooler climate, it seems very easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Photoberd

customer_reviews.title: Fully waterproof, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, yes - it is WATERPROOF, not just "water resistant" or "water repellent." If your goal is to stay dry, this jacket is for you. The reflective accents are well placed and very visible. Overall quality/construction is excellent. The ventilation is good for casual walking/normal activities, but beware if you run or engage in other vigorous activities (e.g biking to work) - break a serious sweat in this things and it could double as a sauna suit. As to fit, I'm 5'4", 135 pounds and athletic, and a medium has plenty of room for layering (plus the sleeves are just the right length). Paired with the right rain boots, it's even kinda cute.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very waterproof just a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: I am anywhere from an 18/20 to 22/24 on top so I went with the 3x. It is snug in the hip/stomach area (I'm curvy so big boobs bug butt) but good room in bust. The fabric does not have one ounce of stretch and does not breathe, so it's great for waterproof just gets stuffy. They do have some vents cut in which is nice. I guess I just wish it was roomier in the stomach and hips. Black color looked nice and half the price of most similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Wyk

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic zipper, only wore it a handful of times :(
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say I love everything about this jacket except the cheaply made plastic, not even hard plastic zipper. I bought this 5 months ago, have worn it about 6 times while doing outside chores in rain and drizzle and now it's totally unwearable. The zipper is utter crap. I wish they had used a metal zipper and this jacket would have been awesome
customer_reviews.author: should be doing laundry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly across the shoulders for the size. Body is cut as a straight, slightly slimmer women's cut rather than a straight, thicker men's cut which I like. Sleeves are a little long but it is a rain jacket and helps keep your hands dry. Velcro straps at wrists to help keep sleeves up and fitted should you choose to. Excellent waterproofness and breathes VERY well to spite a few other comments. Excellent rain jacket.
customer_reviews.author: LB Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered a Large in this jacket since I normally wear a large in most tops and jackets, but it was too big. I processed an exchange through Amazon (which could not have been any easier!) and got a medium. It is perfect!! This jacket is great quality and will look great once I get it monogrammed. It is definitelty waterproof and will keep you dry on the rainiest days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS JACKET
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS JACKET!!! It fits according to size and is so pretty. I purchased Turquoise and it was a little brighter than I expected, but very pretty. I live in Alabama so the weather here is never extremely cold, but for possibly a very short time. I can see me wearing this all winter long. I want another one, but I really don't need it! I just want it just to, to have another color. I would love to have the red and black, but obviously that one is very popular.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T.

customer_reviews.title: A Word of Caution
customer_reviews.text: I have had this jacket for several months and I love it. Today the strangest thing happened with this jacket. I used it in the rain and then hung it on a hook on the inside of my closet door to drip dry. The wet sleeve was touching the painted door and when it dried the sleeve stuck to the paint on the door. I had to peel the sleeve from the door and when I did that it pulled the paint off the door and the paint is now adhered to my jacket. So be careful where you hang it when it is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I got a better look then I bargained for! My jacket is a bright yellow that takes me back to being a kid. It looks good and fits well. I've worn it in the rain a couple of times and it kept me dry. I didn't get sweaty as you sometimes do with rain wear in the summer. I'm really looking forward to getting a lot of use for it this fall. Its a tapered fit, so it won't take a lot of bulk underneath, but a cardigan should fit nicely with it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and room for layering
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly!!! For jackets I am usually between a small or medium depending on the style. I am 5'3 ~125lbs and the small is exactly what I wanted, plenty of room for multiple layers underneath and is loose at the bottom. I have the light pink colored jacket and the color matches the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it. I usually wear a medium or a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. I usually wear a medium or a small and I ordered the medium but it fit a big large. I'm keeping it. The color is great I got the aqua and it looks just like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get great compliments every time I wear this.. great fit.. love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Myers

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I read, I expected the jacket to run small- sounded perfect for me, as I'm petite. However, when I got it I was swimming in fabric and the jacket came down to my knees. Quality and material seem good otherwise. Will return. For reference, I'm 5'2", 110lbs and I bought an xsmall.
customer_reviews.author: swim_good

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Although this is advertised as 'wash by hand' the instructions say "wipe clean with a damp cloth". Although the jacket is interesting and looks well made, the color fabric is very cheap. More like a thin vinyl. Too cheap for me! Why would they make a jacket you can't even 'hand wash'?
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: It is hot and will tear easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is a rubber raincoat. It is hot and will tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves aren't lined
customer_reviews.text: Body has a mesh lining but the sleeves don't, in the mint green anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen

customer_reviews.title: and it is so pretty! I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got the pink rain jacket, and it is so pretty! I would definitely recommend. The reflective ribbon is so clear in the dark too!
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: I hated how the mesh inside the sleeves bunches up when ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this jacket. I hated how the mesh inside the sleeves bunches up when you put on the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

product_meta.title: Charles River Apparel Women's New Englander Waterproof Rain Jacket
product_meta.description: The original New Englander rain jacket is the essential rainwear jacket, made exclusively by Charles River Apparel. Wind and waterproof with heat-sealed seams to keep out wind and rain. Polyurethane shell fabric bonded to a woven backing to provide additional fabric strength. Lined with mesh for air-flow and taffeta nylon in sleeves for easy on and off. Hood and open hem with shock cord drawstring. Adjustable cuffs to seal out the elements. Front chest vented for breathability. When looking for quality apparel, look to Charles River Apparel. Charles River Apparel infuses their clothing with technology, performance and contemporary style. Traditional New England values bring innovation to everything they make innovation in how it fits to the way it feels. Charles River Apparel offers function that performs and fashion that lasts. After more than 30 years of leading quality, the family-owned business pushes into the future with their eyes on the horizon of innovation. "Look Good. Feel Good. Charles River Apparel."
feature_bullets: Zip-front rain jacket featuring breathable mesh lining, reflective striping, and bungee-cord hood
Adjustable hook-and-loop wrist straps, front yoke and underarm vents to allow for air-flow circulation
